column1: Isolate yourself at home or another site away from others.
column2: Call your health care provider for further instructions, including information about COVID-19 testing.
column3: Follow the guidance in 'What to do if you have COVID-19 symptoms but have not been around anyone diagnosed with COVID-19'.

column1: Quarantine yourself at home or another site away from others.
column2: Testing is strongly recommended. If exposure date is known, test no sooner than 72 hours after exposure. If already tested, test again if symptoms develop.
column3: Follow the guidance in 'What to do if you were potentially exposed to someone with COVID-19'.

column1: Isolate yourself at home or another site away from others.
column2: Follow guidance in 'What to do if you have confirmed or suspected COVID-19'.

column1: Follow the instructions provided by the public health or medical professional.
column2: Continue isolation or quarantine as directed.
